field.txt: Installation Summary
Below are
Servicemix Home [${application.base.path}/${servicemix.relative.path}] - This is where Servicemix is installed.
Tomcat Home [${application.base.path}/${tomcat.relative.path}] - This is where Tomcat is installed.

Tomcat Server HOST [${tomcat.hostname}] - This is the hostname where tomcat is running. If you want to make this Application avaliable from the internet you may need to provide this to your network administrator.

Tomcat Server Secure PORT [${tomcat.port.ssl}] - This is the secure HTTP port for Tomcat. If you want to make this Application avaliable from the internet you may need to provide this to your network administrator.

caBIG Integration Hub caGrid Service URL [https://${tomcat.hostname}:${tomcat.port.ssl}/wsrf-ihub/services/cagrid/CaXchangeRequestProcessor] - This will be the url to reach your caGrid service interface when the install is finished.

caBIG Integration Hub non-caGrid Service URL [https://${servicemix.hostname}:${cxf.bc.port}/CaXchangeRequestService?wsdl] - This will be the url to reach your non-caGrid service interface when the install is finished.
Servicemix Log Dir [${application.base.path}/${servicemix.relative.path}/log] - This is where the Servicemix logs can be found.
Tomcat Log Dir [${application.base.path}/${tomcat.relative.path}/logs] - This is where the Tomcat logs can be found.
Database URL [jdbc:postgresql://${database.host}:${database.port}/${database.name}]
Database User [${database.username}]
